item.title: Ansell Edge 82-133 Nitrile Gloves
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
• Manufactured with a thinner nitrile formulation that increases comfort and improves flexibility without compromising protection
  • Offers textured fingertips to provide an improved grip for a variety of applications
  • Packed 300 gloves per dispenser box to provide additional value and convenience.
  • Usage/Application Examination
    Material Nitrile
    Size S (6.5 - 7), M (7.5 - 8), L (8.5 - 9), XL (9.5 - 10)
    Brand Ansell Edge 82-133
    Compliance Standard Category III; EN 420:2003 + A1:2009
    Glove Type Mid forearm
    Quantity Per Pack 300 per box
    Model Name/Number Ansell Edge 82-133
item.content:encoded:
• Manufactured with a thinner nitrile formulation that increases comfort and improves flexibility without compromising protection
  • Offers textured fingertips to provide an improved grip for a variety of applications
  • Packed 300 gloves per dispenser box to provide additional value and convenience.
  • Usage/Application Examination
    Material Nitrile
    Size S (6.5 – 7), M (7.5 – 8), L (8.5 – 9), XL (9.5 – 10)
    Brand Ansell Edge 82-133
    Compliance Standard Category III; EN 420:2003 + A1:2009
    Glove Type Mid forearm
    Quantity Per Pack 300 per box
    Model Name/Number Ansell Edge 82-133

PRODUCT DETAILS

  • MATERIALNITRILE
  • NOT MADE FROM NATURAL RUBBER LATEXYES
  • COLORCOBALT
  • CUFF LENGTHSTANDARD
  • POWDER CONTENTPOWDER-FREE
  • EXTERNAL GLOVE SURFACETEXTURED FINGERS
  • FREEDOM FROM HOLES (INSPECTION LEVEL I)1.5 AQL
  • PALM THICKNESS (MM/MIL)0.06 / 2.4
  • FINGER THICKNESS (MM/MIL)0.08 / 3.1
  • ALLERGY PREVENTIONLATEX (TYPE I)
  • AVAILABLE SIZESS (6.5 – 7), M (7.5 – 8), L (8.5 – 9), XL (9.5 – 10)
  • TESTED FOR USE WITH CHEMOTHERAPY DRUGSNO
  • SILICONE FREEYES
  • STERILENO
  • ANTISTATICYES
  • DOUBLE GLOVING RECOMMENDATIONYES, AS UNDERGLOVE
  • GLOVE LENGTH (MM/INCHES)230 / 9.1
  • PRODUCT SEGMENTATIONHIGH TOUCH
